author: seyeoyeniyi
title: A platform for ordering drugs onlin
description: Problem of need for delivering drugs to doorstep of patients especially in light of physical restrictions due to Corona Virus

assessments.note: The proposal appears to be submitted in the wrong category.
This proposal has nothing to do with the challenge setting (attract entrepreneurs to Catalyst).
The proposal doesn't mention how it will address the challenge, I recommend that it be submitted to an appropriate challenge.
I fail to see the connection between this dApp and proposer outreach.
The proposal is for a new application of the cardano blockchain, and not a way to bring additional proposers into catalyst.
The proposer claims to have relevant experience to implement their proposal, however, they do not provide a detailed explanation on how they plan to execute their plan.
There is no plan on how the proposal will address the challenge.

There is no reasonable plan and there is no information on how Cardano's blockchain will be used in this proposal.

The proposer's experience is not relevant to the development of a website
No background is given for the proposer.
The proposal is mostly an idea without a plan to support it.
The proposer does not provide any information on the timeline for deliverables nor a budget breakdown.
There is no information provided how the proposal will address the challenge.
The proposal description doesn't describe how it will address the challenge.
No goals, metrics, or KPIs are given for a proposal that seems to be in the wrong category.
There is no plan to bring additional proposers into catalyst using this proposal.

solution: A website where the populace can order for drugs of choice and pay and it is delivered to their doorstep.
experience: Worked in the pharmaceutical sector for about 10 years in logistics, quality assurance, sales and production department.
